nodes.text: The Penhalla system was located in the Klina sector, a part of the Slice portion of the Outer Rim Territories. It shared its name with the Penhalla Contention, which was fought at some point between 19 BBY and 0 BBY.
The Penhalla system was established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which placed it in grid square S-13.
